frog.entities

Class Shopkeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • frog.entities.Entity
      • frog.entities.Shopkeeper

  • public class Shopkeeper
extends Entity
    Represents a shopkeeper which you can interact with to bring up a shop GUI.
    Author:
    Jeremy Mills
